title: Shusha FK
text:
Shusha FK () was an <a href="Azerbaijan">Azerbaijan</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Baku">Baku</a>. It represented the city of <a href="Shusha">Shusha</a>.
History.
The club was founded on 1 September 2009 as Shusha, then changed its name to "Shusha 09". In 2010, club once again returned to its old name and immediately admitted to the <a href="Azerbaijan%20First%20Division">Azerbaijan First Division</a> in 2010.
Shusha FK was dissolved on 18 July 2015, after main sponsors <a href="SOCAR">SOCAR</a> stopped funding the club.
Managers.
 Guleli Bagirov prezident (23.05.2016)
